description:
Demolition of the existing industrial building and the erection of 3 residential buildings (two six storey and one five storey building) comprising a total of 71 residential units. Block A: a six storey block fronting Peckham Rye; Block B: a six storey building on Solomon's Passage; Block C: a five storey building together with basement parking for 62 no. cars. 
(Amendment to approved application 04/AP/0694 and 03/AP/1028- RE-SUBMISSION of refused application 05/AP/0797)
